title: Air Sampling Technican
desc: Took sole responsibility for collecting, documenting and delivering air samples for analysis.
Wrote chain of custody and field drawings documents to accompany air samples.
Earned New York State Department of Labor Asbestos Air Sampling Certification.
Coordinated with clients and contractors to help projects progress in a timely fashion.

title: Cashier
desc: Assisted customers with varied inqueries, including directing them to relevent department.
